#sidebar Sidebar

== _abstract class_ aCssMinifierFilter ==
This class is the abstract definition of a minifier filter every minifier filter have to implement.

Minifier filters are used for pre-processing the array of [ApiTokensACssToken tokens] returned by the 
[ApiParserCssParser CssParser] to add, remove or change [ApiTokensACssToken tokens].
----

=== Properties ===
==== _protected_ `array` $configuration = array() ====
The filter configuration.
----

==== _protected_ [ApiMinifierCssMinifier CssMinifier] $minifier = `null` ====
Instance of the [ApiMinifierCssMinifier CssMinifier] of the filter.
----
	
=== Methods ===
==== `void` _public_ __construct([ApiMinifierCssMinifier CssMinifier] $minifier, `array` $configuration = array()) ====
Constructor setting the instance of [ApiMinifierCssMinifier CssMinifier] and the plugin configuration.
 * [ApiMinifierCssMinifier CssMinifier] $minifier : Instance of the [ApiMinifierCssMinifier CssMinifier]
 * `array` $configuration : Filter configuration (optional)
 * *Returns:* `void`
----

==== `integer` _abstract public_ apply(`array` &$tokens) ====
Applys the filter logic on the array of [ApiTokensACssToken tokens].

Minifier filters have to implement this method and apply their filter logic on the array of [ApiTokensACssToken tokens].
This method have to return the amount of modified (added, changed or removed) [ApiTokensACssToken tokens] as `integer`.
If the return value is larger than 0 the array will get rebuild by the [ApiMinifierCssMinifier CssMinifier].

To remove a [ApiTokensACssToken token] you only have to set the index to `null`.
 * `array` &$tokens : Array of [ApiTokensACssToken tokens]
 * *Returns:* `integer` Amount of changed [ApiTokensACssToken tokens]
----
